name: 4Drive Z Drifting Car Games
description:
Dive into a brand new driving experience. Ignition - is a next gen street racing game, which will challenge your driving skills on max. You are main hero of this story. Drift through famous Japanese touge, reach your max speed on large autobahns, calculate every angle while racing on tiny streets of Tokyo.
Large variety of cars from all around the world. More than 30 models of high detailed car models with an enormous choice of bodykits and styling options. Create your unique ride by applying custom decals.
Together it’s easier to reach the top. Play with friends. Find new friends and talk to them using chat system.
Don’t forget to rest, because this game will swallow you completely. Good luck on the road.
